name: Flight Simulator Gauge File
summary: Learn about .GAU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Flight Simulator X Steam Edition

content: Gauge files must be stored in the C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\FS200x\Gauges folder to be accessible by the program. Custom gauges can be created with custom photos or artwork and C++ programming.

description: Aircraft gauge used by Microsoft Flight Simulator; includes altimeters, GPS displays, weather radars, radio stacks, etc; can be imported and used with various airplanes.
